I
               
              may
               
              not
               
              prove
               
              inferior
               
              to
               
              yourself
              .

speaker: CLARENCE
text:
You
               
              that
               
              love
               
              me
               
              and
               
              Warwick
              ,
               
              follow
               
              me
              .

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Not
               
              I
              .
               
              My
               
              thoughts
               
              aim
               
              at
               
              a
               
              further
               
              matter
              :

speaker: RICHARD
text:
I
               
              stay
               
              not
               
              for
               
              the
               
              love
               
              of
               
              Edward
              ,
               
              but
               
              the
               
              crown
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Clarence
               
              and
               
              Somerset
               
              both
               
              gone
               
              to
               
              Warwick
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Yet
               
              am
               
              I
               
              armed
               
              against
               
              the
               
              worst
               
              can
               
              happen
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
And
               
              haste
               
              is
               
              needful
               
              in
               
              this
               
              desp’rate
               
              case
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Pembroke
               
              and
               
              Stafford
              ,
               
              you
               
              in
               
              our
               
              behalf

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Go
               
              levy
               
              men
               
              and
               
              make
               
              prepare
               
              for
               
              war
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
They
               
              are
               
              already
              ,
               
              or
               
              quickly
               
              will
               
              be
              ,
               
              landed
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Myself
               
              in
               
              person
               
              will
               
              straight
               
              follow
               
              you
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
But
               
              ere
               
              I
               
              go
              ,
               
              Hastings
               
              and
               
              Montague
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Resolve
               
              my
               
              doubt
              :
               
              you
               
              twain
              ,
               
              of
               
              all
               
              the
               
              rest
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Are
               
              near
               
              to
               
              Warwick
               
              by
               
              blood
               
              and
               
              by
               
              alliance
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Tell
               
              me
               
              if
               
              you
               
              love
               
              Warwick
               
              more
               
              than
               
              me
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
If
               
              it
               
              be
               
              so
              ,
               
              then
               
              both
               
              depart
               
              to
               
              him
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
I
               
              rather
               
              wish
               
              you
               
              foes
               
              than
               
              hollow
               
              friends
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
But
               
              if
               
              you
               
              mind
               
              to
               
              hold
               
              your
               
              true
               
              obedience
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Give
               
              me
               
              assurance
               
              with
               
              some
               
              friendly
               
              vow
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
That
               
              I
               
              may
               
              never
               
              have
               
              you
               
              in
               
              suspect
              .

speaker: MONTAGUE
text:
So
               
              God
               
              help
               
              Montague
               
              as
               
              he
               
              proves
               
              true
              !

speaker: HASTINGS
text:
And
               
              Hastings
               
              as
               
              he
               
              favors
               
              Edward’s
               
              cause
              !

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Now
              ,
               
              brother
               
              Richard
              ,
               
              will
               
              you
               
              stand
               
              by
               
              us
              ?

speaker: RICHARD
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              in
               
              despite
               
              of
               
              all
               
              that
               
              shall
               
              withstand
               
              you
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Why
              ,
               
              so
              .
               
              Then
               
              am
               
              I
               
              sure
               
              of
               
              victory
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Now
               
              therefore
               
              let
               
              us
               
              hence
               
              and
               
              lose
               
              no
               
              hour

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Till
               
              we
               
              meet
               
              Warwick
               
              with
               
              his
               
              foreign
               
              power
              .
